Image.Title: Optical store
Image.Text:
Optical store

Dr. Garza carries a wide selection of designer frames and sunglasses. Get on his mailing list and attend his next "designer trunk show."

Image.Title: Professional Staff
Image.Text:
Professional Staff

Our office manager, Tammy McDaniel, is an ABO-certified Optician with over 20 years experience in family eye care. You'll love her as much as we do!

Image.Title: The Latest Technology
Image.Text:
The Latest Technology

Dr. Garza uses the latest technology to accurately diagnose your current vision condition. He will explain all your options and answer all your questions.

Image.Title: Optomap Retinal Exam
Image.Text:
Optomap® Retinal Exam

Our office features the Optomap® digital retinal imaging system as part of our comprehensive eye exam so you can make informed decisions about your eye health.

Image.Title: Comprehensive Eye Exam
Image.Text:
Comprehensive Eye Exam

Dr. Garza conducts every eye examination personally. He wants to get to know you, improved your vision, answer questions and enhance your quality of life.

Image.Title: Glaucoma Screening
Image.Text:
Glaucoma Screening

The only way to detect glaucoma is to test for it. Dr. Garza uses applanation tonometry, instead of air puffs, to precisely and comfortably screen patients.

Image.Title: Kid Friendly
Image.Text:
Kid Friendly

At Complete Family Eye Care, we specialize in children aged 3 years and up. Our pediatric eye chart features symbols for kids who donâ€™t yet know their ABCs!
